children.text: Whenever you add a booking, EVA will guide you through the preparations and send you useful info on the day of your flight.
We will send you a reminder for you to check in a few days before your flight.
Receive notifications about the latest searches that you've run.
Receive exclusive offers on your app.
Please note that in order to receive Vueling notifications you must enable them in the Settings menu of your mobile phone, in Sound and Notifications.
